mapper.select: SELECT b.code, b.r_flag, b.c_flag FROM t_batch b LEFT JOIN t_delivery d ON b.code = d.batch_code WHERE d.code = #{code}
select code from t_delivery where batch_code = #{code} and r_flag = 0

select d.delivery_code, d.item_code, i.name, i.source, d.number, i.shelf_code, e.box_label, e.box_area from t_delivery_item d left join t_item i on i.code = d.item_code left join t_delivery e on e.code = d.delivery_code where d.delivery_code in (select code from t_delivery where batch_code = #{code}) and d.c_flag = 0 and d.sd_flag = 0 order by d.item_code limit 1
select count(delivery_code) from t_delivery_item where delivery_code = #{code} and c_flag = '0'
select count(code) from t_delivery where batch_code = #{code} and c_flag = '0'
